title: PCLinuxOS 2008 - Hebrew Enabled Remaster (07/05/2008)
description:
PCLinuxOS 2008 Hebrew Enabled Remaster - Updated 07/05/2008

Optimized for Israeli Users and Hebrew Speakers for a full set replacement (1.64gb) Includes: Wine, w32codecs, dvd playback, ntfs, openoffice with office 2007 file support, emulators, games, amarok & banshee, latest firefox & thunderbird, pptp support, windows shortcut key pre-configured, compiz-fusion and a lot more to name!

DISCLAIMER: This Remaster is NOT endorsed by PCLinuxOS community!

NOTE: It is the end-users responsibility to comply (or not) with the laws of the country they live in. You can always use the Synaptics to remove the w32codecs and dvddec packages.

MAIN CHANGES:
- New Kernel
- New KDE (3.5.9)
- New Firefox 2.0.0.14
- Everything that&#039;s new from the Repos in the past two months!
- Added cdfs / wordnet / flash tools and a lot more to name!
- TOTALLY NEW GUIDES!

Installation Instructions: http://www.freewebtown.com/sefy/pclinuxos/install/index.html
FOR HEBREW: You MUST select Israeli Keyboard & Alt + Shift in the primary boot setup!

Please comment and suggest, or there might not be a new release.
md5sum: 61c13c3729e4bc0ef09fceb4088505b3
